message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business. I understand it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $1,400,000, which is a significant price point considering its value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident it will be mutually beneficial. Let me know if you're interested!
